emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Autonomous Coding Systems
emerging_technologies.description: Fully autonomous systems capable of developing software from high-level requirements to deployment, integrating with version control systems, and performing real-time collaborative coding and debugging.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces the entry barrier for software development, increases productivity but potentially displaces traditional coding jobs.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires significant advancements in AI, trust in AI systems, and regulatory frameworks to ensure ethical practices.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: Blockchain technology designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers, ensuring long-term security of digital transactions and data.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances security in critical infrastructure and personal data protection, potentially reducing fraud.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires standardization of quantum-resistant algorithms, industry consensus, and integration into existing blockchain systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural-Enhanced Learning Systems
emerging_technologies.description: Systems that integrate AI with neurofeedback to optimize learning processes by adapting to individual cognitive patterns.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could lead to personalized education, reducing educational disparities but might also increase surveillance concerns.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Willingness to adopt neurotechnology, privacy laws, and ethical considerations regarding mind-reading capabilities.

emerging_technologies.name: Space-Based Solar Power
emerging_technologies.description: Solar panels in space that collect solar energy and beam it back to Earth for consumption, offering unlimited clean energy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for significant reduction in carbon emissions, geopolitical implications due to control over energy sources.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, international cooperation, and the economic viability of space launches.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Digital Identity
emerging_technologies.description: A system where individuals control their digital identity through blockchain, reducing reliance on centralized authorities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances user privacy and control but could complicate identity verification processes.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Need for widespread blockchain adoption, regulatory acceptance, and user education on managing digital identities.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Smart Cities
mainstream_technologies.description: Cities integrated with AI for traffic management, energy efficiency, public safety, and waste management.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: High adoption in developed urban areas, with significant investments in infrastructure.

mainstream_technologies.name: Neural Interface Devices
mainstream_technologies.description: Devices that allow direct communication between the brain and computers, enhancing human capabilities.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Increasingly common in medical applications, education, and personal productivity.

epoch_themes.description: AI integration into every aspect of life, from daily tasks to complex decision-making processes.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shifts job markets, enhances productivity, raises ethical questions about AI governance.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, education reform, and workforce retraining initiatives.

epoch_themes.description: Technological advancements focused on sustainability to address climate change and resource scarcity.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes environmental awareness, shifts in energy policy, and global cooperation.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Rising investments in green technology, international treaties on sustainability, and consumer demand for eco-friendly solutions.
